activities.title: MFU Music Festival 2024 (edited)
activities.description:
🗣️Ahhhhh.. It's not a big job for sure!! ️
🔊In addition to concerts and appointment cards, we also have fun zone for everyone to come and enjoy.🎪

In the music festival “MFU Music Festival 2022 Angem Phase 2”❤️ 🔥
🗓On 31 October 2565, time 18:00 onward.
📍 At Landao

activities.title: Halloween (Horror Night)
activities.description:
Join us if you dare! 🎃

You are invited to join our Halloween Booth in MFU Music Festival 2022 on Monday, 31 October 2022 starting at 18.00 hrs. at HRH Princess Srinagarindra Statue (Landao).


Highlights of this activity you can't miss:
- "Ghost" Photo Exhibition  😈👹
- Halloween Makeup 👄💄
- D.I.Y. Halloween Cookies 🍪
- Halloween Photo Booth & Costume Contest 🎃


Come and get free Halloween Cookies 🍪 at our booth!! (First come first serve for 100 visitors) 


For students who would like to join Halloween costume contest, please walk in to register at the booth during 18.00-18.45 hrs.

activities.title: Chinese & English Corner
activities.description:
You're invited!!!

🀄🎉 欢迎来到 Chinese & English Corner at MFU! 🎉🀄

Ready to dive into the world of Chinese & English language and culture? 🌏

✨ Join us for a fun and engaging "Chinese Corner" activity where you can practice your Mandarin, learn about Chinese traditions, and make new friends! 🗣️🤝
📅 Date: October 20, 2024 🕒 Time: 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM 📍 Location: Study Room no 6, Chinese Language Center, Mae Fah Luang University

Whether you're a beginner or a fluent speaker, there's something for everyone. Let's explore the beauty of the Chinese culture together! 🇨🇳🌸

See you there! 😃
activities.location: Study Room no 6, Chinese Language Center, Mae Fah Luang University
